comments:

I may opened comparison view from Synchronization view. Can't tell if there was any unsaved editors at that moment, but all editors were gone after deactivation was completed. I wonder if deactivation was iterating trough editors, but one of them was already closed at that time, maybe because some other editor was opened or something like that...
Can't reproduce, please reopen if you see this again and know how to trigger it.  We are getting the current editors from the workbench itself, so there should be no stale editor references.
